properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 11:34AM CST until January 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze.
Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Brule County.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to midnight CST Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT
